predicate.note: Frames file for 'privilege' based on Brown ULA. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: to grant a benefit enjoyed by few

example.name: Money
example.text: As for his finances, I-2 was never privileged *-2* *PRO*-2 to know exactly how much Letch had "salted away".
example.arg: *PRO*-2 to know exactly how much Letch had "salted away"
